name: Super Lucrative Opportunity Of Pouring Coffee
name_original: Super Lucrative Opportunity Of Pouring Coffee
description:
Collect the right amount of sugar and creamer before delivering heroes their coffee!

If any hero runs out of Patience, it's game over!

Controls

  • Jump - Up Key or W
  • Double jump (to reach higher floors) - Jump button pressed twice
  • Fall through floor - Down Key or S
